title: Embedding Files in Go Programs
description: This challenge aims to test your understanding of the embed package in Golang. The embed package allows programs to include arbitrary files and folders in the Go binary at build time.

meta.title: Embedding Files in Go Programs
meta.description: Learn how to use the embed package in Golang to include files and folders in your Go binary at build time.

verify.name: Verify Embedding Files in Go Project
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
